1.name: wordpress/formcraft-add-on-pack
1.description:
What is FormCraft?

FormCraft is a WordPress form builder which allows you to make awesome forms and surveys using a GUI, drag-and-drop interface, and allows you to track submissions and form analytics right from your WordPress admin panel. Click here to know more about FormCraft

What does FormCraft Add-On Pack do?

This pack integrates the three popular email services (MailChimp, AWeber and Campaign Monitor) with the forms made with FormCraft. This plugin allows you to add to your list of subscribers when users fill out beautiful forms made with FormCraft.

Is it Easy to Integrate?
